Directions: In a large skillet, brown chicken on both sides in oil. Stir in the tomatoes, mushrooms, green pepper, onion, water, Italian seasoning and pepper. bring to a boil. Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 10-15 minutes or until chicken juices run clear.

Remove chicken and keep warm. Combine the flour and cold water until smooth; stir into tomato mixture. Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. Serve chicken and sauce over rice.
Ingredients: 8 (4 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
1 (28 ounce) can stewed tomatoes, cut up
